original:
Joseph and the Virgin Mary sat by the fireplace, contemplating if it was time to have "the talk" with their son, Jesus. Though only twelve, they believed he was wise enough to learn about the mysteries of life. The following evening, they gathered around the dinner table, Joseph cleared his throat and began.
"Son, there comes a time when one must understand where babies come from," Joseph started,
sampled:
Joseph and the Virgin Matron sat by the fireplace, contemplating if it was time to have "the talk" with their son, Jesus. Though only twelve, they believed he was wise enough to learn about the mysteries of life. The following evening, they gathered around the dinner table, Joseph cleared his pipe and began.
"Son, there comes a time when one must understand where babies come from," Joseph started,
